description: This header file declares the LocalStore class, which implements the ILocalStore interface for managing a local data store using SQLite. It includes method declarations for opening the store, creating tables, setting limits, retrieving entries and counts, removing entries, and adding entries, along with private helper functions and member variables.

classes.name: LocalStore
classes.description: Implements the ILocalStore interface for interacting with a SQLite-based local data store, providing methods for CRUD operations and table management.

methods.name: Open
methods.description: Opens the database connection at the specified path.

methods.name: CreateTable
methods.description: Creates a new table in the database.

methods.name: SetLimit
methods.description: Sets a limit on the number of entries in a specified table.

methods.name: GetEntriesCount
methods.description: Retrieves the count of entries within a range from the specified table.

methods.name: GetEntries
methods.description: Retrieves a list of entries from the specified table starting from a given index.

methods.name: RemoveEntries
methods.description: Removes entries from the specified range in a table.

methods.name: AddEntry
methods.description: Adds a new entry to the specified table.
